fuse.tuplets_by_reference¶

abjad.tools.fuse.tuplets_by_reference(tuplets)¶
Fuse zero or more tuplets in the ‘tuplets’ list. Tuplets to fuse must carry the same multiplier. Tuplets to fuse must be of the same type. Works on in-score and outside-of-score tuplets. Returns newly instantiated, fused tuplet.

Previous topic

fuse.tie_chains_by_durations

Next topic

harmonictools.add_artificial
